LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays a collection of records in a datatable for selection

propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: 01: Datatable Object API Name
propertyType.description: Select the API Name of the SObject to use in the Datatable

property.name: tableData
property.label: 02: Datatable Record Collection
property.description: Record Collection variable containing the records to display in the datatable.

property.name: fieldList
property.label: 03: Fields to Display
property.description: A comma seperated list of the field API names to display in the table

property.name: maxSelection
property.label: 04: Max Selection
property.description: The maximum number of rows the user can select from the table. For single selection, set to 1. For unlimited, set to -1.

property.name: selectedRows
property.label: 05: Selected Rows
property.description: The selected records in the table. As input this functions as pre-selected rows, and as output serves as the user selected rows

property.name: firstSelected
property.label: 06: First Selected
property.description: The first selected record can be saved to an output record variable (Useful if only allowing a single selection)
